ClassDesc: SpellCheckerService provides an abstract base class for a spell checker. This class combines a service to the system with the spell checker service interface that spell checker must implement. In addition to the normal Service lifecycle methods, this class introduces a new specific callback that subclasses should override @B_android#service#textservice#SpellCheckerService#createSession_E@ to provide a spell checker session that is corresponding to requested language and so on. The spell checker session returned by this method should extend @B_android#service#textservice#SpellCheckerService#Session_E@. @B_android#service#textservice#SpellCheckerService#Session#onGetSuggestions_E@ should return spell check results. It receives @B_android#view#textservice#TextInfo_E@ and returns @B_android#view#textservice#SuggestionsInfo_E@ for the input. You may want to override @B_android#service#textservice#SpellCheckerService#Session#onGetSuggestionsMultiple_E@ for better performance and quality. Please note that @B_android#service#textservice#SpellCheckerService#Session#getLocale_E@ does not return a valid locale before @B_android#service#textservice#SpellCheckerService#Session#onCreate_E@
